compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

D:\\project\\automation-workflow.serviceRawFile:
service: automation-workflow

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: eu-west-1
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: "Allow"
          Action:
            - "sqs:SendMessage"
          Resource:
            - arn:aws:sqs:eu-west-1:034362054340:automation-workflow-dev-QueueManagerQueue-*
            - arn:aws:sqs:eu-west-1:034362054340:automation-workflow-dev-OCRQueue-*
            - arn:aws:sqs:eu-west-1:034362054340:automation-workflow-dev-OpenAIQueue-*

functions:
  queueManager:
    handler: src/queue-manager.handler
    events:
      - sqs:
          arn:
            Fn::GetAtt:
              - QueueManagerQueue
              - Arn

  gmailTrigger:
    handler: src/gmail-trigger.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: workflows/trigger
          method: post

  ocrNode:
    handler: src/ocr-node.handler
    events:
      - sqs:
          arn:
            Fn::GetAtt:
              - OCRQueue
              - Arn

  openaiNode:
    handler: src/openai-node.handler
    events:
      - sqs:
          arn:
            Fn::GetAtt:
              - OpenAIQueue
              - Arn

resources:
  Resources:
    QueueManagerQueue:
      Type: AWS::SQS::Queue

    OCRQueue:
      Type: AWS::SQS::Queue

    OpenAIQueue:
      Type: AWS::SQS::Queue
